Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Horemakhbit; darker glazed striations of lappet wig, outline of fillet and hoes, two vertical lines of bordered hieroglyphic text identifying the deceased as god's father and temple scribe of the Amun domain.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
